== AZLOCO Installfests/Linux Workshops Page ==

Welcome to the AZLOCO Installfests/Linux Workshops page.  AZLOCO co-sponsors installfests/Linux Workshops with the Phoenix Linux User Group (PLUG) on the 1st and 3rd Saturdays of each month and semi-annually with the Cochise Linux User Group (CLUG)
